title: Invitation to music
brief_description: Shows glimpses of Firenze during its annual May Music Festival, including excerpts from Rossini, Mozart and Verdi, as well as a Punch and Judy show. Features the Orchestra and Chorus of the Firenze Musical May Festival and the Corp de Ballet of the Royal Opera House of Roma.
